Text:

I have a request, if you can:  Ginger.

If you have any videos of her I would love to have them.  I am particularly looking for the one where she spreads lotion on herself. 

This or any videos you have of her would be much appreciated.  Thanks!

I would post a link to a preview of her, but I get "Database Error" when I include links.  *sigh*
